name: cottonseed production, for sowing, organic | cottonseed, organic, for sowing | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20341/documentation

Inventory refers to the production of 1kg of cotton seed, organic meant to be used for sowing.

Activity starts with the cotton seed arriving in the processing plant.

Activity includes, treatment (pre-cleaning, cleaning, eventually drying, chemical dressing and bag filling), and storing of the seed in the processing centre. The activity ends with the cotto-seeds ready for transprotation.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/016:Support activities to agriculture and post-harvest crop activities/0164:Seed processing for propagation

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This dataset is extrapolated from the dataset of conventional cotton-seed production, for sowing.
